name: GUAVA
description:
3D of GUAVA's logo. 

GUAVA is an online artist-run gallery. Founded in 2019 by Mariana Destro, it is a curatorial platform for exhibitions and projects made especially for the internet. Focused on Latin American contemporary art by women, BIPOC, and LGBTQIA+ artists and curators, GUAVA aims to build closer dialogue between artistic practices and the broader fields of society, never letting go of the ephemeral nature of a world in constant change. 

GUAVA's staff is Mariana Destro, as director, and Thiago Granai, as resident curator. Since its beginning, GUAVA held 7 exhibitions, 3 projects and has exhibited works from 29 artists and curators: Ana Matheus Abbade, Be Leite, Fernanda Azou, Flora Bahri, Gisele Lima, Guinho Nascimento, Iah Bahia, Jan Araújo, Jonas Van, Júlia Godoy, Laura Fraiz, Lídice, Luisa Callegari, Luisa Günther, Luiz Ferreira, Malena Stefano, Mariana Destro, Nilson Filho, Rafael da Escóssia, Roberta de Oliveira, Rodrigo D'Alcântara, Romulo Barros, Sallisa Rosa, Stenio Freitas, Taís Koshino, Thiago Granai, Vitor Breves, Wisrah Villefort and Yná Kabe Rodríguez. 

Check it out: https://guava.gallery
